info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Analyze Text Authoring
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.

Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this
option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for
example Java, JavaScript.

parameters.name: trainedModelLabel
parameters.description:
Trained model label to export. If the trainedModelLabel is null, the default
behavior is to export the current working copy.

Triggers a job to import a project. If a project with the same name already
exists, the data of that project is replaced.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project to use.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
The format of the project to import. The currently supported formats are json
and aml formats. If not provided, the default is set to json.

Gets the detailed results of the evaluation for a trained model. This includes
the raw inference results for the data included in the evaluation process.

performance measurements of the model e.g., F1, Precision, Recall, etc.

post.description:
Assign new Azure resources to a project to allow deploying new deployments to
them. This API is available only via AAD authentication and not supported via
subscription key authentication. For more details about AAD authentication,
check here:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/authentication?tabs=powershell#authenticate-with-azure-active-directory

these resources, and deletes existing deployments assigned to them.

Lists the deployments to which an Azure resource is assigned. This doesn't
return deployments belonging to projects owned by this resource. It only
returns deployments belonging to projects owned by other resources.
Lists the supported languages.

Lists the supported prebuilt entities that can be used while creating composed
entities.

AssignDeploymentResourcesOptions.description: Represents the options for assigning Azure resources to a project.

resourcesMetadata.description: Represents the metadata for the resources to be assigned.

values.name: separateComponents
values.description:
Every component's match or prediction is returned as a separate instance of the
entity.

values.name: combineComponents
values.description:
When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the components'
spans are merged together into one span combining all of them.

CopyAuthorizationOptions.description:
Represents the options for authorizing a project copy to the current Azure
resource.

storageInputContainerName.description: The name of the storage container.

allowOverwrite.description:
Whether to allow an existing project to be overwritten using the resulting copy
authorization.

CopyProjectOptions.description:
Represents the options for copying an existing project to another Azure
resource.

targetProjectName.description: The project name to be copied-into.

expiresAt.description: The expiration of the access token.

targetResourceId.description: Represents the target Azure resource ID.

targetResourceRegion.description: Represents the target Azure resource region.

CreateProjectOptions.description: Represents the options used to create or update a project.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description:
The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example,
use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description:
An object containing more specific information than the current object about
the error.

values.name: percentage
values.description:
Split the data into training and test sets according to user-defined
percentages.

values.name: manual
values.description: Split the data according to the chosen dataset for every example in the data.

EvaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description:
Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to
percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description:
Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the
evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description:
Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the
evaluation kind is percentage.

ExportedModelOptions.description: Represents the options for creating or replacing an exported model.

projectFileVersion.description: The version of the exported file.

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional
information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

ExportedProjectAssets.description: Represents the assets of an exported project.

InnerErrorModel.description:
An object containing more specific information about the error. As per
Microsoft One API guidelines -
https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description:
An object containing more specific information than the current object about
the error.

values.name: CustomSingleLabelClassification
values.description:
For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each
file will have only one label. For example, file 1 is classified as A and file
2 is classified as B.

values.name: CustomMultiLabelClassification
values.description:
For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each
file can have one or many labels. For example, file 1 is classified as A, B,
and C and file 2 is classified as B and C.

values.name: CustomEntityRecognition
values.description:
For building an extraction model to identify your domain categories using your
own data.

values.name: CustomAbstractiveSummarization
values.description:
For building an abstractive summarization models which are able to summarize
long documents.

values.name: CustomHealthcare
values.description:
For building an text analytics for health model to identify your health domain
data.

values.name: CustomTextSentiment
values.description:
For building a sentiment models which are able to extract sentiment for long
documents.

ProjectSettings.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description:
The threshold of the class with the highest confidence, at which the prediction
will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold should be
between 0 and 1 inclusive.

amlProjectPath.description: The path to the AML connected project.

isLabelingLocked.description: Indicates whether the labeling experience can be modified or not.

runGptPredictions.description: Indicates whether to run GPT predictions or not.

gptPredictiveLookahead.description: The predictive lookahead for GPT predictions that is specified by the user.

ResourceMetadata.description: Represents metadata for the Azure resource..

customDomain.description: Represents the Azure resource custom domain.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this
option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for
example Java, JavaScript.

SwapDeploymentsOptions.description: Represents the options for swapping two deployments together.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

deploymentExpirationDate.description: Represents deployment expiration date in the runtime.

TextAnalysisAuthoringAssignedProjectDepl.description: Represents the metadata for assigned deployments for a project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringConfusionMatrixCell.description: Represents a cell in a confusion matrix.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCreateDeploymentOpt.description: Represents the options for creating or updating a project deployment.

assignedResourceIds.description:
Represents the resource IDs to be assigned to the deployment.
If provided, the deployment will be rolled out to the resources
provided here as well as the original resource in which the project is created.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description:
Represents the document evaluation result for a custom entity recognition
project.

customEntityRecognitionResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for entity recognition.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

customEntityRecognitionEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to extraction evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomHealthcareDoc.description:
Represents the document evaluation result for a custom entity recognition
project.

customHealthcareResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for entity recognition.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomHealthcareEva.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom health care project.

customHealthcareEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to health care evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description:
Represents the document evaluation result for a custom multi-label
classification project.

customMultiLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for multi label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description:
Represents the evaluation summary for a custom multi-label classification
project.

customMultiLabelClassificationEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to multi label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description:
Represents the document evaluation result for a custom single-label
classification project.

customSingleLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for single label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description:
Represents the evaluation summary for a custom single-label classification
project.

customSingleLabelClassificationEvaluatio.description: Contains the data related to single label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomTextSentiment.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom sentiment project.

customTextSentimentResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for text sentiment.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomTextSentiment.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom text sentiment project.

customTextSentimentEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to custom sentiment evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeleteDeploymentOpt.description: Represents the options for deleting a project deployment.

assignedResourceIds.description:
Represents the resource IDs to delete the deployment from.
If not provided, the deployment will be rolled out from all the
resources it is deployed to.
If provided, it will delete the deployment only from the specified
assigned resources, and leave it for the rest.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentDeleteFro.description: Represents the state of an existing delete deployment from specific resources job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentJobState.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentResource.description: Represents an Azure resource assigned to a deployment.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityLabel.description: Represents an evaluation result entity label.

offset.description: Represents the entity offset index relative to the original text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRecog.description: Represents the entity recognition evaluation result for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRegio.description:
Represents the evaluation comparison between the expected and predicted
entities of a document region.

expectedEntities.description: Represents the region's expected entity labels.

predictedEntities.description: Represents the region's predicted entity labels.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEvaluationR.description: Represents the evaluation result of a document.

language.description:
Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language.
For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish
etc.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentHealthcareE.description: Represents the healthcare evaluation result for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentMultiLabelC.description:
Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted classes that are
result from the evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentSentimentLa.description: Represents an evaluation result Sentiment label.

offset.description: Represents the sentiment offset index relative to the original text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentSingleLabel.description:
Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted class that result
from an evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentTextSentime.description:
Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted sentiment that
result from an evaluation operation.

expectedSentimentSpans.description: Represents the document's expected sentiment labels.

predictedSentimentSpans.description: Represents the document's predicted sentiment labels.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityEvaluationSum.description: Represents the evaluation summary for an entity.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityRecognitionEv.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

confusionMatrix.description:
Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be
the same). The matrix is between the entity that was labelled and the entity
that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description:
Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

microRecall.description:
Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description:
Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

macroRecall.description:
Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

projectKind.description: Represents the project type that the evaluation ran on.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description:
The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example,
use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: The last trained date time of the model.

lastTrainingDurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the model's last training request in seconds.

hasSnapshot.description: The flag to indicate if the trained model has a snapshot ready.

predicted.

TrainingJobOptions.description: Represents the options for starting a new training job.

evaluationOptions.description:
Represents the evaluation options. By default, the evaluation kind is
percentage, with training split percentage as 80, and testing split percentage
as 20.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.

ProjectKindQueryParameter.name: projectKind
ProjectKindQueryParameter.description: The project kind, default value is CustomSingleLabelClassification.

values.name: CustomSingleLabelClassification
values.description:
For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each
file will have only one label. For example, file 1 is classified as A and file
2 is classified as B.

values.name: CustomMultiLabelClassification
values.description:
For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each
file can have one or many labels. For example, file 1 is classified as A, B,
and C and file 2 is classified as B and C.

values.name: CustomEntityRecognition
values.description:
For building an extraction model to identify your domain categories using your
own data.

values.name: CustomAbstractiveSummarization
values.description:
For building an abstractive summarization models which are able to summarize
long documents.

values.name: CustomHealthcare
values.description:
For building an text analytics for health model to identify your health domain
data.

values.name: CustomTextSentiment
values.description:
For building a sentiment models which are able to extract sentiment for long
documents.

StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.name: stringIndexType
StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional
information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this
option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for
example Java, JavaScript.
